channel.title: Which container should REDASH_ADHOC_QUERY_TIME_LIMIT be applied to?
channel.description:
Hi
I am applying query timeout limits to our Redash installation, which container should the env vars be applied to for REDASH_ADHOC_QUERY_TIME_LIMIT ? I had added them to the server but should it be the scheduler or the actual worker?
Thank you
